Divano Loto

The Loto sofa is the expression of a modular design that reinvents outdoor comfort with contemporary elegance. Designed to integrate harmoniously with outdoor spaces, Loto offers limitless compositional freedom, adapting perfectly to your desires.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”in_container” full_screen_row_position=”middle” column_margin=”default” equal_height=”yes” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”column_reverse” column_direction_phone=”column_reverse” scene_position=”center” text_color=”dark” text_align=”left” row_border_radius=”none” row_border_radius_applies=”bg” overflow=”visible” class=”row-padding-top info-prodotto-pagina” id=”calima” overlay_strength=”0.3″ gradient_direction=”left_to_right” shape_divider_position=”bottom” bg_image_animation=”none” gradient_type=”default” shape_type=””][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”right” column_element_direction_desktop=”default” column_element_spacing=”default” desktop_text_alignment=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” sticky_content=”true” sticky_content_functionality=”js” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_backdrop_filter=”none” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_blank” column_position=”default” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/3″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” animation_type=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” column_padding_type=”default” gradient_type=”default”][vc_column_text css=”” max_width=”400″ text_direction=”default”]Loto modular sofa system by TA Design is created with the aim of achieving perfect aesthetic harmony with the Linfa pergola, integrating seamlessly and naturally.

The perimeter frame, made of aluminum, is a structural element that serves as support for the backrests, a surface for comfortable seating, or a tabletop, perfectly embodying the concept of functionality.

Loto is available in two technical variants:

  • Open-cell, draining polyurethane foam, an elastic and breathable material that ensures rapid liquid drainage and constant ventilation. Ideal for exposed outdoor environments.
  • Standard closed-cell polyurethane, covered with a waterproof and drip-resistant cover, ideal for greater protection against humidity and long-lasting durability.

The powder-coated aluminum frame ensures stability and weather resistance while maintaining a refined, minimalist aesthetic.[/vc_column_text][nectar_btn size=”large” open_new_tab=”true”
